name: Alice
bio: Alice handcrafts elegant ceramic vases and home decor using sustainably sourced clays. She focuses on functional art with modern silhouettes.

name: Bob
bio: Bob designs and 3D-prints playful gadgets & custom miniatures. He loves rapid prototyping and personalized gifts.

name: Charlie
bio: Charlie builds rustic-modern furniture and DIY home decor, blending reclaimed materials with clean design.

name: Diana
bio: Diana creates bespoke textile pieces — bags, accessories and custom sewing kits — with a focus on craftsmanship and durability.

name: Eve
bio: Eve upcycles vintage denim and textiles into fashionable, one-of-a-kind bags and jackets, championing sustainable fashion.
